title: Same Flower -  the speaker views the daisy as

content.question: In the first stanza, the speaker views the daisy as

choices.label: an ordinary yet beloved natural object
a beautiful yet uncomprehending part of nature
a common yet controversial object of devotion

content.answer: an ordinary yet beloved natural object

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
